description: It is a game that trains your melody memory, and also a colorful keyboard that can simulate a lot of instruments. The gameplay is simple: listen to the melody and then repeat it if you can. There is also a multiplayer mode where you can play with your friends on the same device. (Currently, up to 4 players is supported.) In the improvise mode, you can create and play your own melody / music simply by dancing your fingers on the Melody Squares. The Melody Squares can simulate a lot of instruments in different keys, octaves, and scales. Currently 13 instruments are supported: - Acoustic Grand Piano - Acoustic Guitar (nylon) - Overdriven Guitar - Violin - Church Organ - Soprano Sax - French Horn - Music Box - Taiko Drum - Percussive Organ - Harmonica - Trumpet (The online leaderboard is currently not working because the original service provider OpenFeint has shut down its service in December of 2012. A new online leaderboard system will be implemented and used in the next version.) Have fun!
release_text: Version 1.0.2: - Added 3 new instruments: Harmonica, Trumpet, and Percussive Organ Version 1.0.1: - Reduced memory usage - Added a note in the readme

description: A simple yet customizable battery widget with colorful icon, text & background. Features: - Minimalistic style - Highly-customizable battery icon shape, color, size, fatness, and outline thickness - Colorful semi-transparent background (You have the complete control of the color, transparency, and even the roundness of the rounded edges / corners) - Customizable text size, fatness, and color - Battery info details screen that opens with a single tap - Easy switch of Wi-Fi power and Bluetooth power (supports Android 2.0 or higher) - Convenient shortcuts to GPS setup and Display setup - Live preview of the customized battery widget on the setting screen - Possibility to have more than one Nice Simple Battery widgets on the home screen, each with its own customization settings - Accurate reading of the battery level that updates once the power level is changed - Battery-friendly design How to use: This is a widget for your homescreen (desktop). To use it, please follow these simple steps. For newer versions of Android (e.g. 4.0), you may drag and drop a "Nice Simple Battery Widget" item from the Widgets tab of your app list to the homescreen. You may refer to this demonstration video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xXAWx7gsJ-o For older versions (e.g. 2.3.3) you can long press (i.e. tap and hold) on any empty space on your home screen, then select Widgets and choose a "Nice Simple Battery Widget" item. Different widget items correspond to different widget sizes (e.g. 1x1, 2x2, etc.). After adding the battery widget to your homescreen, tapping it will open the configuration window. You can add more than one "Nice Simple Battery Widget" to your homescreen and each of them can have its own unique settings. *NOTE* If the power level reading does not update properly, please exclude this widget from any task killer app that you might be using. You can also try to remove this widget from your homescreen and add it back again, and see if it solves the problem.
release_text: Version 1.6.0: - New feature: Option to draw the battery cap (under the "Battery Icon" section) - New feature: Options for using a different color when battery is low (under the "Advanced Settings" section) - Now clicking on the preview can change the power level displayed in the preview - Applied a number of bug fixes and minor changes

description: A simple yet customizable clock widget with colorful semi-transparent background 　 　 Features: 　 - Minimalistic style - Colorful semi-transparent background (You have the complete control of the color, transparency, and even the roundness of the rounded edges / corners) - Customizable text size, fatness, and color - Customizable time and date formats - Live preview of the customized clock in the setting screen - Possibility to have more than one Nice Simple Clock widgets on the home screen, each with its own customization settings - Custom time offset option for displaying time in different timezones - Custom year offset option for special calendar systems - Ability to launch any user-selected application (e.g. alarm clock) upon a click on the widget - Different widget sizes support - Battery-friendly design 　 　 　 How to use: This is a widget for your homescreen (desktop). To use it, please follow these simple steps. For newer versions of Android (e.g. 4.0), you may drag and drop a "Nice Simple Clock Widget" item from the Widgets tab of your app list to the homescreen. You may refer to this demonstration video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xXAWx7gsJ-o For older versions (e.g. 2.3.3) you can long press (i.e. tap and hold) on any empty space on your home screen, then select Widgets and choose a "Nice Simple Clock Widget" item. Different widget items correspond to different widget sizes (e.g. 1x1, 2x2, etc.). After adding the clock widget to your homescreen, tapping it will open the configuration window. You can add more than one "Nice Simple Clock Widget" to your homescreen and each of them can have its own unique settings. *NOTE* If the time does not update properly, please exclude this widget from any task killer app that you might be using. You can also try to remove this widget from your homescreen and add it back again, and see if it solves the problem.
release_text: Version 1.9.0: - New feature: Click-to-launch option for the date text (under "Other Settings") - New feature: Chinese lunar calendar option for Chinese systems (under "Date") - New feature: Option to use English date and am/pm display for non-English systems (under "Other Settings") - Fixed an issue where the weekday wasn't properly displayed when the system setting is used for date display - Reduced the app file size

description: A photo widget that supports semi-transparency and optional frame of any color 　 　 Features: - Minimalistic style - Frameless semi-transparent photo display on home screen (supports Android 2.2 or higher) - Retaining of the photo's aspect ratio (never improperly stretches or cuts off any part of it) - Customizable photo frame of any color you like - Slideshow of all photos in a directory (customizable photo update interval: every 10 seconds, every minute, every hour, every day, etc.) - Built-in photo cropping and rotating - Free zooming mode for viewing photos with intuitive gestures (e.g. pinch to zoom for Android 2.0 or higher) - Four different widget sizes: 2x2, 2x4, 4x2, 4x4 　 　 　 How to use: This is a widget for your homescreen (desktop). To use it, please follow these simple steps. For newer versions of Android (e.g. 4.0), you may drag and drop a Nice Simple Photo item from the Widgets tab of your app list to the home screen. You may refer to this demonstration video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xXAWx7gsJ-o For older versions (e.g. 2.3.3) you can long press (i.e. tap and hold) on any empty space on your home screen, then select Widgets and choose a Nice Simple Photo item. Different items correspond to different widget sizes. Tapping the widget will open the configuration screen. You can configure the widget and browse the photos which are in the same directory of the currently selected photo there. You can add more than one "Nice Simple Photo Widget" to your home screen and each of them can have its own unique appearance settings. 　 *NOTE* If the photo does not update properly, please exclude this widget from any task killer app that you might be using. You can also try to remove this widget from your homescreen and add it back again, and see if it solves the problem.
release_text: Version 1.4.0: - New feature: Now you can use a photo viewer app of your choice to view a photo when you single-tap on it on the photo browsing interface - New feature: Now the slideshows can optionally show all photos in the sub-directories as well - New feature: Added the "every 4 hours" slideshow interval - Rearranged the options so that the slideshow options are now separated from the single-photo display option - Fixes, etc... Complete changelog can be found int he in-app readme.

description: This is the donation key app for the Nice Simple Widgets family. By contributing a small amount, you can enjoy the ad-free versions of all my Nice Simple Widget apps and encourage further development of updates / new apps. *** This app is not a functional widget app itself. Instead, it is an add-on that removes the ads of my widget apps. You need to download and install the supported widget(s) separately. *** Currently, the supported widgets are: Nice Simple Clock (version 1.6.0 or newer) Nice Simple Battery (version 1.4.0 or newer) Nice Simple Photo Widget (all versions) More may come and this donation app will continue to work for them as well! :) Please note that you do not need to uninstall the existing widget app(s). In fact, you should keep the installation of them. After installing this donation app, all the Nice Simple Widgets will become ad-free automatically. For example, by installing both the Nice Simple Clock app and this donation app, you will essentially have an ad-free version of the Nice Simple Clock app. Thanks for your support! :) If you would like to donate some more, please use my donation page: http://nullium.com/donate/
release_text: Version 1.0.1: - Enabled the app to move to a SD card

description: This is the Pro version of StyleNote which has even more features and is ad-free. StyleNote's Key Features: - Powerful note editor with rich text formatting styles (bold, italic, underline, and strikethrough) - Highly customizable note text sizes and colors - Semi-transparent memo widgets for putting your notes on your homescreen - Sync and backup with cloud storage using your own Dropbox account (free and optional; StyleNote does not depend on any online service) - Bullet-point list / todo-list / checklist support - Flow view of all your notes: an overview of all notes in one place - more than just a list of note titles (optional) - Note organization with custom notebooks / folders - Custom-scope note search - Optional date/time display - Custom note ordering (you can move any note up / down and have your own ordering of notes) - Automatic note sorting by note title, last modified time, or creation time - Easy note sharing / sending - Password lock for your private notebooks - Automatic regular backup for your important notebooks PRO features: - Extra customization power to give different notebooks different background colors - Advanced note list customizations including spacing between notes and note highlighting border size/color options - 15 style template saving slots (if you need more, just let me know) - Automatic notebook sorting by name or creation time - Regular automatic backup to your Dropbox account - Adjustable automatic backup frequency (e.g. once per day) - Word / character / paragraph count - Ad-free * Easy upgrade from free to pro * When you launch StyleNote Pro for the first time, you will be asked whether you want to automatically transfer all the notes and settings from StyleNote to StyleNote Pro. Just click "Yes" and all will be done automatically. If you need help with StyleNote, you can check the FAQ and ask questions in our user forums. You are also welcome to suggest new features and talk about anything there: http://forums.nullium.com
release_text: Version 2.2.0: - New feature (experimental, for Android 3.0+): Option to enable homescreen widget scrolling (just do not enable it if it doesn't work for you but please report any problem via the user forum or email) - New feature: Option for different back button behaviors for the note editor - New feature: Option to choose a custom backup file path - Fixes ... (Full changelog can be found in the in-app readme)

description: Hacker's Quest is a stunning text adventure that needs a great hacker to reveal dark secrets! Inspired by the Linux shell your smartphone turns into a hacking terminal. You'll get to know many people and companies - some will be moral and others may be evil. Listen to your knowledge of human nature and trust your technical skills to cope with this thrilling adventure. Perform well enough and you'll be a big boy soon! Keep your feet on the ground and be prepared at all times! As you infiltrate your enemies danger's all around you. You'll need to pass several challenges and minigames to become the winner in the end. If you're keeping your eyes open you gonna find some hidden information which distracted hackers will miss! Hacker's Quest offers a medal system, therefore you can earn achievements by mastering the quest. * Hacker's Quest is a virtual offline adventure. Playing this game will not teach you hacking. The entire computer environment is simulated. No real computers are hacked and we do not advocate hacking or other forms of cyber crime. Prior knowledge of Linux or computer technology is not required.
release_text: v1.4 * Google Play Achievements * bugfixes & improvements v1.3 * polished UI and better KitKat support * integrated Facebook support

description: Photo Editor:- Edit your photo instantly with this powerful Photo Editor app, which is one of the best photo editing tool in android. Get the best photography art in your photos with large number of amazing photo effects. You can create good colour effect photos with this photo editor app which will let you create beautiful photos. This app comes with beautiful photo frames as well. Only photos is needed to be selected and get large varieties of photo effects, overlays, enhances options to beautify your picture. You can also use red eyes removal option in Photo Editor Tool and share your pictures to Facebook or Instagram or tap to save. This is almost equal to any photo editor pro apps. Most Attractive Features:- • Avail 19 unique editing photo effects. • Colours of the photos can be changed. • You can use wide varieties of beautiful photo frames. • Pictures can be filtered by keeping vignette. • Get adjustments like Saturation, contrast, Tint, Brightness, on your pictures. • You can add any Text and Cool Stickers on your pictures of any font sizes. • You can also draw animation on this Photo editing tool. • Download our Photo Editor app to get your edited pictures shared on Facebook, Instagram or any social app.
release_text: + Updated UI + Updated share screen ... + Corrected multiple problems... + Fixed first screen issue and also removed full screen ads from share page... + Defect fix in share page for android version 2.3.3 - 2.3.7 and also other UI modifications ...

description: The best application in the world of Catholic prayers. Hundreds of Catholic prayers divided into categories. You can read or listen to the phone read the prayer for you *. Do not know what prayer will pray? The app has a unique system to randomly select the prayers, which gives you the opportunity to learn new prayers and increase their faith. Want to read some prayers without're connected to the internet? Simply add the desired prayer to favorites you can see it anytime (You can add as many prayers you want, limited only by the available space on your phone memory). Do not know the full name of the prayer you want? Use the search. Simply enter a unique name that the system will show all the prayers that contain this name! Prayers are separated into the following categories: Basic Catholic Prayers Prayer to Jesus Marian Prayers Prayers of the Saints Other Prayers * Note: This application performs automatic Register on our servers, this record serves to measure the popularity of our applications and if necessary contact with users. The data obtained are: email, city and phone number. Registration is done only once and their data are kept confidential. The app provides Catholic prayers in the following languages​​: English, Spanish, French, Portuguese and Italian.

A lot of questions in short quiz. I bring to your attention a short quiz with questions of the club "What-Where-When". Answering a question, you earn points and climb in the rankings. For each question, you can get a hint. For every hint of points earned is reduced. The questions in the game pretty difficult.
release_text: [0.1.2] relaunch game, change server. fix some bugs.

description: Dominosa is a logic puzzle game. You have to find the location of all dominoes on the grid. A domino is a pair of numbers. You can have only one of each pair. Dominoes originated in China before being brought to Europe in the early eighteenth century. Dominosa is a German puzzle, according to Martin Gardner, invented by O.S. Adler in 1874. It was patented by Richard Osa (pseudonym for O.S. Adler) in Germany in 1893 as German Reichs Patent No. 71539 and he published it in 1894 under the name of "Dominosa" combining 'Domino' with his initials. It later appeared in a domino puzzle book in 1912 co-authored by Fritz Jahn.

Знакомая всем с детства, увлекательнейшая игра "Эрудит" (Scrabble в английском варианте). Можно играть одному, с друзьями оффлайн, с друзьями онлайн, со случайными соперниками, рейтинговые игры. Система рейтинга - аналог Elo в шахматах. Словарь постоянно исправляется и пополняется. Если Вас что то не устраивает в словаре - пожалуйста напишите мне на почту oxothuk76@gmail.com , мы внесем изменения. Чтобы иметь возможность играть в Эрудит через Интернет, Вам необходимо создать свой профиль в меню "Профили". Если у Вас уже есть профиль, то Вам необходимо авторизоваться. После создания профиля или авторизации игра Вас "запомнит", и Вам не нужно будет вводить свои данные при последующих запусках игры. В случае необходимости Вы можете сменить пароль. Имя профиля и пароль должны состоять не менее, чем из 5, но не более, чем из 15 символов латинского алфавита или цифр и не содержать пробелов Информацию о Вашем текущем профиле можно получить, нажав на кнопку "Мой профиль". Меню "Договорные" служит для того, чтобы Вы могли сыграть с Вашими друзьями через Интернет. Один из игроков должен создать игру, указав секретное слово, которое должно состоять не менее, чем из 5, но не более, чем из 10 символов латинского алфавита или цифр и не содержать пробелов. Другой игрок присоединяется к игре, нажав на кнопку "Играть" и введя секретное слово, которое ему сообщит первый игрок. Тип игры (Эрудит или Scrabble) будет зависеть настроек игрока, создавшего игру. Остальные настройки правил не повлияют на правила игры через Интернет. В настроящее время они фиксированы. В будущем это может измениться. Чуть позже будут добавлены рейтинговые игры между случаными игроками. Обратите внимание, что при игре через Интернет пользовательские словари не будут учитываться. description: An application that develops logic and allows you to play alone or up to four friends together. An exciting puzzle game with the opportunity to play for up to four people simultaneously. It will please everyone who enjoys spending free time with profit and develop logic and brainpower. It is possible to change the level of difficulty, which allows everyone to choose a suitable mode to enjoy the game to the full. Key features of the app " Infection " : • a simple and intuitive interface - not overloaded and nice to look at; • a variety of levels - from easy to those where you really need to think; • an opportunity to play with each other and with the computer at the same time; • Flexibility - each player can have a different color and the level of difficulty depending on the situation . On the whole, the application for logic "Infection " was created in the spirit of the formerly popular game Attax. The atmosphere in the application remains the same, but the logic and the in-process have been significantly improved. Now it is possible to feel what’s it like to be a real virus, seizing opponents in its grasp. The application "Infection" can be used for a good time in a company of friends, and for self-development of one’s daily thinking processes .

Quick fix for the security thread of automatically calling the "tel" Uri with USSD codes from embedded iFrames within homepages. Using this vulnaribility an attacker might reset the phone, block the SIM card, ... This app registers as handler for the "tel" Uri. When a webpage contains the malicious code, the app chooser will pop up and "Security: Block Tel URI" will be in the list. If you choose it, it will show you the Uri that was blocked. Warning: The app chooser will only show up if you have not choosen a default dialer before! This needs to be reset for this security fix to work. Please use a testing site to see whether the Security fix will show up, for example http://www.heise.de/security/dienste/USSD-Check-1717811.html

FEATURES: • More than 250 famous solitaires such as FreeCell, Klondike, Pyramid, Spider, Joker, etc. • A variety of card backs and backgrounds • Detailed rules and statistics • Hints on available moves • Bookmarks on a card layout About Paragon Paragon Software Group is the leading developer of multi-platform software applications for smartphones and desktop computers. GREEKMUSEUMS is an Augmented Reality application that uses Layar technology. The app needs the Layar Reality browser in order to work, so at first it will check your device for the Layar browser and if the browser is allready installed, the app will open it directly with the GREEKMUSEUMS Layer. If the Layar browser is not installed, the app will try to install it for you. GREEKMUSEUMS, as an augmented reality app, lets you search more than 400 museums throughout the whole Greek territory. The application displays all available museums in relation to your current position, providing information such as exact location of the museum, the distance in meters from your current location, opening hours, address, email, contact numbers, the website of each museum (if available) and a map with directions. The app provides filters in order to limit the search, such as the Search range which can be between 100m and 50km from your current location and the Museum categories from which you can choose to display museums by topic such as archaeological, historical, visual arts, etc. There are three types of views for displaying the museums, the Camera view (AR) which is the default, the Map View and the List View. GREEK MUSEUMS as an Augmented Reality app, displays information ONLY when you are in Greece. Enjoy your stay in Greece!

Park your car smarter and faster with ParkMe, the world's largest and most accurate parking app! Download our free award-winning parking app, now available on Android to find the cheapest, closest parking around! Check out our features: • View informative maps of parking lots and garages in your area. • Check daily & monthly parking rates, see prices laid out on the map and compare costs. • Set our parking timer to help you avoid overstaying, overpaying or getting a ticket. • See real-time info on exactly how many spots are open in a particular garage or lot. (Select markets only) • When you decide on a lot or garage, get directions to the nearest driveway -- not just the street address. * Pay for parking and save money Why circle the block wasting gas and time and fraying your nerves? Whether you're looking for city parking, sports parking or special event parking, Park Me has it covered. Get parking info before you leave the house, or pull over and use the app when you're close to your destination. With prices laid out on Park Me maps, you can always easily compare parking options. The database at Park Me contains parking spots in over 500 cities around the world. • United States: Los Angeles, San Francisco, New York, Seattle, Austin, Houston, Washington D.C., San Diego, Santa Monica, Denver, Chicago, Atlanta, Philadelphia, Dallas, Boston, Phoenix, New Orleans, Portland, Miami... • Canada: Ottawa, Vancouver, Montreal, Toronto, Edmonton, Calgary, Winnipeg, Quebec City... • Europe: London, Paris, Madrid, Rome, Munich, Frankfurt, Prague, Vienna... • Plus hundreds of other cities. Can't find parking in your city? Is a rate incorrect? Park Me wants to know! We add and update places to park every day. If you have any other suggestions or requests, we'd love to hear from you as well (@ParkMe).

description: Speed book reader is using spritz reading technique. It will increase your reading speed without losing comprehension. Got stuck with a Chemistry problem and needing to see the periodic table? Do you need help in computing for molecular masses of compounds? Unaware of Pierre Curie’s accomplishments? Basic Chemistry eLearning is a quick reference made available for free to Chemistry students. It provides essential tools for acing your Chemistry lessons, such as a periodic table of elements, a mole-gram converter, an extensive glossary of Chemistry terms, a molecular mass calculator, and a list of history’s known chemists, among others. Tested to run on most Android smartphones and tablets. Don’t miss this useful app from the University of Pangasinan-Phinma’s College of Information Technology Education (UPCITE), courtesy of BSIT students Khristian Manuelle Geminiano, Nikko Villanueva, Bryan Negrillo, Aaron James Vergonia, and Mhac Geron Calimlim.

description: Do you like to knit or crochet? Knitwits is the ultimate knitting and crocheting companion, designed to fit all your needs! Keep track of all your knitting/crocheting project information and the calculation and inventory info is handy for when buying yarn or needles for a new project. You can even view your Ravelry stash or import all your projects from Ravelry, and update them on the go! Features include: - Intelligent row counter (informs you of completion, stitch increase/decrease and pattern rows) - Store photos and detailed notes of all your projects - Import and edit all your Ravelry projects - View your Ravelry Stash (edit coming soon!) - Store your knitting needle and crochet hook inventory - Needle and hook size conversions between US and metric - Yarn weight standards chart - Calculate the amount you need for a substitute wool or yarn for your pattern - A variety of light and dark themes I'm constantly looking for ways to improve your experience, if you have any comments or suggestions please feel free to email me. Or better yet, come say hi in our group on Ravelry - http://www.ravelry.com/groups/knitwits-for-android

description: ***** Can you guess what the hidden word is? ***** Riddle Me This is a word association puzzle game that tests your ability to think about how four different words are related. It will seem easy at first, but it will get progressively more challenging. Some Great User Reviews: ★★★★★ "Very addicting, a must have game!" - Dorothy ★★★★★ "Great game! Awesome fun!" - Jeff ★★★★★ "Fast fun! Addictive and sleek game that tests your smarts." - Hans If you love the games Taboo, Catch Phrase, or 4 Pics 1 Word, then you'll love Riddle Me This! ★ Over 150 levels of tricky puzzles to play! ★ No Ads!! And Free!! ★ Simple and highly addicting gameplay! ★ Perfect for fans of puzzles, word games, brain thinking, mind games, logic puzzles and riddles with answers. ★ Instant FUN! No signup. A fun puzzle game for toddlers and kids from ages 1 to 6 featuring 16 cartoon cars and construction vehicles such as race car, police car, school bus, tractor, fire engine, ambulance, garbage truck, excavator, transmixer, bulldozer and more in 20 shape & tangram puzzles! This is the school edition. The content is the same as the original version, but allows purchase by schools and educational organizations. When a puzzle is completed children are rewarded with a variety of fun celebrations and interactions such as balloon popping. The fun matching activities help improve visual perception, knowledge of shapes & develop fine motor skills by dragging and dropping puzzle pieces to match their holes. Perfect for preschoolers. Features • Kids Safe, please see our Privacy Policy • Original high quality cartoon art drawn by professional children's book illustrator • Four different vehicle groups: Cars, Trucks, Construction & Community Vehicles • Automatic advance to the next puzzle • Three different puzzle styles with increasing difficulty levels • Interface & touch controls designed for toddlers • Press & hold button to limit menu access to parents PRIVACY POLICY We take privacy very seriously, this app: Does not contain ads Does not contain integration with social networks Does not contain web links Does not use analytics / data collection tools Does not contain in-app purchase WE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACK If you like our app, please take a minute to rate and review it. If you have any questions or need help, please reach us at http://www.pixelenvision.com/support/ or by sending an e-mail to support@pixelenvision.com

description: Radar Tunisia is now available in a new Android version. The application notifies the user in real time by the presence of a fixed speed camera, on all the Tunisian territory. Following strong demand from users, the application became functional in background and you can, thus, be informed by the existence of a radar without having to open the application. Also, a new feature has been incorporated to allow the user to project his speedometer and information, from the phone, directly on the windshield of his car. The content of the page is displayed in reverse due to the mirror effect. Radar Tunisia, in its new version, features additional configuration parameters and a unique design especially with the super attractive speedometer. The application is placed at your disposal to help you adopt a safe driving.

Places Nearby App provides you with a lovely way of finding useful places near you. It gives geolocation a whole new meaning. Places are already categorized for you so you do not have to worry at all. It gives you walking and driving directions to places. It also gives you weather updates for places found in the App. It is sleek and beautiful and easy to use.

All aboard! Do you have a little conductor that loves trains and wants to have fun with colors? Then hop on board for some amazing train colors fun in the Train Game For Toddlers Free Activity App! Your little conductor will have a chug-a-chug-a-choo-choo time playing train & vehicle match games, train puzzles, and best of all… hearing all the colors of the trains, their train horn AND seeing the trains drive! It’s an interactive train delight and designed for ages 2 & up, and especially first time app users. When you download the Trains For Toddlers Activity App you’ll get a trainload of colorful trains fun and: 6 Different Colors of Trains- Hear the train horn sounds, the color, and see them drive. So much fun for all ages! 3 Vehicles Colors Match Games- Designed for ages 3 & up the train-rrific matching games will have them playing with trains and vehicles for three different colors. 4 Train Puzzles For Kids- Colorful and fun train delights and geared for ages 4 & up. NEW Colors Matching Game Train Sounds & Colors Have a toot happy time in the train horn app playing with and learning about trains of different colors. With the easy to use interactive tap and tap sounds your little one only has to touch a train and it will take them to a new screen. A super fun screen with many options to touch that will respond and teach them the color, make its train whistle sounds, AND drive! It’s totally train-riffic interactive fun and playing the train kid games will entertain and educate through play as well! Colorful Train & Vehicles Puzzles The next platform of delight in the train kids games are the puzzles! The engaging and enriching puzzles have all sorts of related cute colorful items on the picture too, so you can create dialogue about the colors as well. The cool puzzles are engaging, fun, and playing the train puzzles for toddlers will also encourage: -Fine motor skills -Reasoning and concept development -Early math skills Vehicles Match Games Your little engineer will have a chug-mazing time playing the Trains and vehicles matching games. Featuring three different colors, the match games are designed for fun and to get them playing with vehicles on those colors too. And engaging in the train games for 4 year kids matching games is totally fun and will also promote: -Fine motor skills. -Memory and recognition skills. -Vocabulary and language. -Trains and vehicles recognition. -Red, Blue, and Yellow color recognition. Design Team: Nancy, Deborah, Sam, Thomas & Belle-Ann. Toot! Hop on board the rainbow train and have a blast learning colors and playing with trains in the Train Game For Toddlers Free Activity App and let your child have fun learning through play with a Play n’ Learn App!

description: Celosvětově nejoblíbenější karetní hra Český Poker je konečně k dispozici i v Češtině pro Vaše mobilní zařízení s Androidem, a to zdarma a bez nutnosti jakékoli registrace! description: เกมไพ่เท็กซัสอันแสนตื่นเต้นที่เป็นที่นิยมไปทั่วโลก เป็นเกมส์เฉพาะคนเก่ง มี่กติกาง่ายแต่เน้นเทคนิคมากอย่างหนึ่ง ต้องใช้ปัญญา กลเม็ด คิดวิธี กติกาเกมง่ายมาก เรียนรู้ง่าย แต่อยากเล่นเก่งยากค่ะ เพื่อนออนไลน์เป็นหมื่อคน โหลดฟรี ไม่ต้องจดทะเบียน มีแข่งขันหลายรอบ แข่งขันคัดออก แข่งขันชิงแชมป์ มาสู้แข่งขันกัน ใครเป็นผู้เชียนจริงฃๆ เรามุ่งมั่นจะสร้างเกมส์ไพ่เท็กซัสอย่างมีคุณภาพสูง อยากให้คนอื่นอิจฉาทรัพย์สมบัติของคุณ เพื่อนๆรอท่านอยู่นะ สักษณะเกม： ดาวน์โหลดฟรี เข้่าสู้ระบบบัญชีface bookและนักเทียวได้ วิธีเล่นเยอะ มีห้องธรรมดา ห้องเร๊วและห้องแข่งขันให้ท่านเลือก เพื่อนออนไลน์เป็นหมื่อคน ริบเริ่มเกมได้ อัดเทพรูปภาพสวยได้ทันที่ เล่นไพ่ยังได้รู้จักเพื่อนใหม่ด้วย ติดตามเพื่อนอยู่ห้องไหนได้ เล่นกับเพื่อนได้ เกม ไพ่ เท็ ก ซั ส อัน แสน ตื่นเต้น ที่ เป็น ที่ นิยม ไป ทั่ว โลก เป็น เกมส์ เฉพาะ คน เก่ง มี่ กติกา ง่าย แต่ เน้น เทคนิค มาก อย่าง หนึ่ง ต้อง ใช้ ปัญญา กลเม็ด คิด วิธี กติกา เกม ง่าย มาก เรียน รู้ ง่าย แต่ อยาก เล่น เก่ง ยาก ค่ะ    เพื่อน ออนไลน์ เป็น ห มื่ อ คน โหลด ฟรี ไม่ ต้อง จดทะเบียน มี แข่งขัน หลาย รอบ แข่งขัน คัด ออก แข่งขัน ชิง แชมป์ มา สู้ แข่งขัน กัน ใคร เป็น ผู้ เชีย น จริง ฃ ๆ เรา มุ่ง มั่น จะ สร้าง เกมส์ ไพ่ เท็ ก ซั ส อย่าง มี คุณภาพ สูง อยาก ให้ คน อื่น อิจฉา ทรัพย์สมบัติ ของ คุณ เพื่อน ๆ รอ ท่าน อยู่ นะ สั กษณะ เกม: ดาวน์โหลด ฟรี เข้่า สู้ ระบบ บัญชี face book และ นัก เทียว ได้ วิธี เล่น เยอะ มี ห้อง ธรรมดา ห้อง เร๊ ว และ ห้อง แข่งขัน ให้ ท่าน เลือก เพื่อน ออนไลน์ เป็น ห มื่ อ คน ริบ เริ่ม เกม ได้ อัด เทพ รูปภาพ สวย ได้ ทัน ที่ เล่น ไพ่ ยัง ได้ รู้จัก เพื่อน ใหม่ ด้วย ติดตาม เพื่อน อยู่ ห้อง ไหน ได้ เล่น กับ เพื่อน ได้

description: Toto je procvičování českého pravopisu. Program nabízí 18 témat pro procvičení češtiny. Nejdříve začíná se základy. To znamená procvičování psaní Ů a Ú, pravidla pro psaní Y/I po tvrdých a měkkých souhláskách. Dále následují testy pro procvičování vyjmenovaných slov, psaní koncovek u podstatných a přídavných jmen, psaní předložek S/Z, párové souhlásky, predpony S/Z a cvičení, kde se testuje shoda přísudku s podmětem (včetně několikanásobného podmětu). Každý si může zkusit krátký diktát, kde pro každou frázi (nebo větu) vybírá správnou volbu. Lekce vždy obsahuje teoretickou část, která vysvětlí téma a upozorní na často vyskytované chyby. Výsledky všech testů se uchovávají včetně chyb. Je možné procvičovat jen chybné odpovědi, takže učení je rychlejší a efektivnější. Jako vždy nabízíme část obsahu zdarma a část je placená. Doporučujeme vyzkoušet naše další programy pro školáky a pro předškoláky. Cena za přístup na všechny lekce je 89 Kč. Naše další výukové hry pro děti: http://www.pmq-software.com/sw/cz/vyukove_hry_pro_deti/ Keywords: pravopis, ČJ, procvičování, psaní Y/I, cvičení z češtiny, český jazyk, diktát This is the practice of Czech grammar. The program offers 18 themes for practicing Czech. First, starting with the basics. This means practicing writing u and rules for writing Y / I for hard and soft consonants. Followed by practice tests for specified words, writing endings for nouns and adjectives, prepositions, writing S / Z, paired consonants, the prefix S / Z and exercise, where we test the predicate give cause (including multiple subject). Anyone can try a short dictation, where each phrase (or sentence) selects the right choice. Lesson always includes a theoretical part, which explains the topic and highlights rife with errors. The results of all tests shall be kept, including errors. It is possible to practice only wrong answers, so that learning is faster and more efficient. As always, we offer some content free and some are paid. We recommend that you try our other programs for schoolchildren and preschoolers. The price for access to all lessons is 89 CZK. Our other educational games for children: http://www.pmq-software.com/sw/cz/vyukove_hry_pro_deti/ Keywords: spelling, CJ, practicing, writing Y / I, exercises Czech, Czech language, dictation
release_text: V poslední verze byla rozšířena o lekce: - psaní i/y v koncovkách podstatných jmen - psaní i/y v koncovkách přídavných jmen - párové souhlásky – b-p, d-t, ď-ť, h-ch, atd. - psaní předložek s a z - psaní předpon s a z - psaní –ě po souhláskách b, p, v

description: 2014運動手遊新生活 READY! GO!!! = =史上最多運動All-in-1的休閒手遊= = 簡單有趣好操作，60秒感受最精采熱血的運動競賽 畫風清新可愛、讓用戶盡情體驗運動休閒的競技快感！競技內容包含籃球、棒球、網球、足球、飛鏢、撞球、保齡球、高爾夫…等數十種競賽項目，競賽中除了可以與自己的好友進行挑戰外，也可以自我訓練嘗試刷新自己的記錄。遊戲中也提供了眾多可愛角色及無厘頭裝備給玩家自行選擇與搭配，給喜歡運動的你無限競賽歡樂！ ■十項全能　什麼運動我都行！ 飛靶、籃球、棒球、網球、足球、飛鏢、撞球、保齡球、高爾夫球、敲彩球、美式足球、桌球、障礙賽、射箭、拳擊來挑啊！敢不！ ++陸續增加：接力賽、射箭、拳擊、有舵雪橇....冬季運動項目…等，想得到的運動通通有！ ■戰帖系統 邀請好友樂趣多！ 好友列表中　邀請朋友下戰帖挑戰運動項目 一教高下　你能成為運動中的武林高手 ■特角蒐集 Kuso配備超吸睛！ 選購特殊能力選手(包括人型與寵物造型)　享受運動娃兒變身趣 上百種無厘頭裝備　一身靚行頭哇熊厲害 圖鑑攤開比一比　看看誰才是蒐集達人 ■每局60秒　創新紀錄超迅速！ 遊戲屬回合制、進行時間短暫 不論是坐車、開會、等上菜、電視廣告…等零碎時間 玩一場無負擔！ ■鐵人競賽　朋友圈紀錄保持NO.1！ 單項運動成績搶金牌　擅用每局「最後的勝負」創新高 周賽月賽淘汰賽　期間總成績瘋排名 誰都別想打破我的紀錄 ■免費禮物點數　免費戳戳禮物盒！ 進行社交行為累積禮物點數 每天都有幸運獎品瘋狂戳一戳 輕鬆帶回遊戲幣、鑽石、B/C級選手、B/C級裝備 ■超級道具強化　強還要更強！ 進入關卡前強化超級道具　立即增加運動超能力 想增加運動時間、起始分數、道具盒出現機率 強化效果永久存在喔！ [最新訊息或與其他玩家交流] 官方網站： http://ms.wasabii.com.tw Facebook粉絲團： https://www.facebook.com/MStwapp [有任何需要排除的問題，請即時聯繫我們] 客服專線：+886- 2-8751-2168 客服信箱： service@cayennetech.com.tw Wasabii手機服務平台： http://www.wasabii.com.tw/mobile
release_text: [版本/活動更新事項] 1.新增運動項目-滑雪、跳台滑雪(冬季奧運會) 2.新增新年活動--蒐集紅包抽獎有機會獲得SSS/SS/S角色及裝備、各種好禮！ 3.更新-運動項目計分總計將從9項更新至13項 4.更新-每日登入遊戲獎勵提升 5.追加新玩家獎勵-首次加入遊戲還可額外獲得選手&裝備抽獎券各1張 [其他事項] 1. 抽獎時若網路狀態不穩，系統將會判斷網路狀態異常後進行重啟，重啟後才會接收抽獎結果視窗[選手/裝備]。 2.last fever發動時有機率性當機問題已修正。 3.網球選手(小萌、雪莉糖)及籃球選手(雪莉糖)無法正常升級問題已修正。

description: Creative Game Kids' Creative Puzzle ★ ★ ★ Brain ★ ★ ★ game for children, preschoolers, as well as adults. Create your own picture using the default elements and store a new picture to the album! The game develops motor skills and creativity of a child! Game features: • Creative game consists of a worksheet, where the unique creation is being made and field of default objects - items that can be used to create the image. In the lower part of the workspace there is a menu consisting of the eraser, a tip and a saving option. • The child must drag items images to create his own unique picture. • No limitation to the number of elements usage and their size - a child can use objects several times, dragging them into the worksheet and change the size of items, delete them, etc. • For the smallest children there is a hint in the game - a bubble button displaying how the picture should look like. • When a unique picture is ready, it can be stored to the album or send to parents. The game has 5 categories of pictures • House • Aquarium • Zoo • Space • Insects 5 wonderful colorful themes for creativity and creating hundreds of unique images for your kids and you! Graphics and exclusive discretion All the elements of the game (elements of pictures) are bright, colorful and designed in details. Great graphics and flexibility - this is something that will help your child learn new things and develop their imagination! While playing, the child acquires and improves drawing skills, motor and visual skills, ability to think abstractly and to find creative solutions. This exciting and vibrant game will be useful for both children of various ages and adults. Even adults will delight playing this app. Approved by parents, teachers and children around the world!

Linux Reference Free is a handy reference app to help you learn Linux on the go. Universal application, runs on both mobile device & tablet. (Pro version is available here : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.poash.linuxreferencepro) Features: * View content offline * No Ads * Test your knowledge with quiz (more question will be added soon) * Easily zoom in or out to view images * Change the font size to read easily, either on mobile phone or tablet * No permissions required * Internet connection not required Quiz Features ★Test your knowledge ★Questions test your understanding of the commands ★Questions can be flagged for later review while the quiz is in progress ★Correct answer, along with the explanation is displayed for each question once the quiz is over. User answers are also displayed ★Questions that are left unanswered do not reveal correct answers Feel free to give us your feedback/suggestions at feedback@poash.com . If you face any problems, let us know. Please avoid leaving negative feedback in the comments. NOTE: Android 4.0 and below versions do not support features of changing text. Consequently, the text changing icons won't show up on these versions.
release_text: Version 1.1.1 1. Correct behaviour of menu for Honeycomb version 2. Minor bugfixes

description: Classic tales come to life in an original free puzzle bubble popper! Touch and pop the classic fairy tale characters featuring the unique Frog Prince, magic hair hero Rapunzel, charming Fairy Godmother and mighty king Arthur. Pop 100s of bubbles and score higher in a huge fantasy castle with pixie dust for the ultimate bubble popper adventure: Bubble Frog Enchanted Prince! Travel to a magical realm and burst unlimited bubbles to collect thousands of points and unlock the secret bonus rewards for the best score. This original bubble popper fantasy takes puzzle solving to exciting levels! Play and pop thousands of bubbles in this compatible puzzle app made for phone and tablet running on Android. Play anywhere and anytime and crush your way to win secret bonuses from the wise king Arthur. This bubble mania is super fun and addictive for young children and parents. Relive the classical story of these magical characters and share the fun with your kids. Moms and dads will love to play this exciting puzzle challenge with their kids! Bubble Frog Enchanted Prince is a great way to have fun with the family. Share your huge scores with family on Google+, Facebook and on Twitter with the easy to use social sharing features! • Classic characters from the classic tales in beautiful detailed graphics featuring the unique Frog Prince, magic hair hero Rapunzel, charming Fairy Godmother and mighty king Arthur. • Have a blast popping bubbles with magical sounds with multiple textures! • Race against time in this puzzle challenge and complete your mission to score higher every time • Completely free bubble popper match 2 game for Android™. • Amazing fun for kids, toddlers, preschoolers and adults with our free puzzle games for kids and adults. Parents will have a great time with their children! • Enjoy superb compatibility with tablets and smartphones including the newest HD models. • Fantastic way to improve learning and develop the brain while having fun all being suitable for children. Download Bubble Frog Enchanted Prince and let this free matching game be a fun tool to entertain your kids and keep the at ease while driving or similar situations where you need to have your children both happy and develop their learning skills, coordination and problem solving abilities.

description: If you appreciated Metar Droid Lite but want more powerful and useful features download Metar Droid Pro: a great application for retrieving and visualizing updated METAR and TAF information. You'll find all MetarDroid Lite features plus: - Widget (NEW) - Coloured weather phenomena - Metar and Taf sharing - Coloured visibility and ceiling for VFR operations - Copy metar and taf to clipboard for use with other apps or for offline use - Favourite list - Metar and taf of favourite location loaded at startup - History of recent metar and taf searches - No advertising *** Note for old versions: due to some changes to NOAA website old versions are not working so please update to latest version to fix the problem. Cheers ***
release_text: Fixed bug due to new NOAA servers

description: "♣♣ CONGRATULATIONS!! This easy-to-use Pregnancy app guide you to all the changes taking place in your baby — and in you! You'll also find important medical info that will help keep you and your baby healthy. Enjoy reading!! Dowload NOW for free - Pregnancy Facts & Tips Week-by-week"

description: Are you looking for the best Voice Changer around. So download Multi Voice Changer (Prank). It is better simply because it is multivoice and multitrack. With this amazing application you can recorder from 1 to 4 different voices and applied different effect to each track as a professional multitrack system. With Prank voice changer you can perform amazing/funny/scary/ telephone prank call and drive your teacher crazy at school. Recored as many voices you want (from 1 to 4) and change, modify, alter them with using the several audio effects presented in this app (i.e., pitch shifting, time straching, fast, slow, backward, reverb, helium, hyper, chipmunk, robot, cyborg, whispering, psyco, possesed, bee, alien). Moreover it is also possible to add a fake environment sound in order to make your prank call perfect (i.e., police siren, rain, storm, seaside, bathroom, disco, war). In particular you can create amazing fake speech using this app: - A speech between you and a monster. - A speech between you and a fake woman. - A speech between you and a devil - A speech between you and a chipmunk. - A lot of other speech. Once you're satisfied, you can save your altered voice, you can also share it with your friends using skype, whatsapp, wechat and gmail or other email. You can also save the audio file and use it as a ringtone HOW TO USE MULTI VOICE CHANGER (PRANK): - Press on the rec button on channel 1 and start to speak (don't speak too much close to the microphone). - Press on stop button when you have finished. - Select an audio Fx. - If you want to add other voices record these using the other channels. - Add fake theme if you want. - Press play to ear your modified voices.
release_text: The best voice changer on android for create amazing prank calls using the multitrack technology

description: Are you going to fool some of your friends with a super fake fart. So Prank Fart Sound is what you are looking for. It is perfect to drive your mom and dad crazy,amazing at school, and perfect to entertain your afternoon and weekend with friends. HOW TO USE FART PRANK SOUND: ★ Shake and fart: Press on the shake icon and move the phone. Your mobile phone will become a farting phone. It is perfect to simulate super gas, wind, and vapors that came out from your butt. ★ Fart Bomb: Select the timer option to create a super fart bomb. ★ Classic way: Press on the fart button to simulate different kind of farts. ★ Cyber Fart: Share your super fart with Friend using whatsapp, gmail, wechat, etc. ★ Create your personal fart: using super processing audio effect it is possible to create your personal fart. It is possible to choose between girl and man farts and also changing the fart's length. Have fun with this amazing app!! The best fart sound and noise in the store. Enjoy the toilet sounds!

Are you looking for the best way to support your favourite soccer or your national team and celebrating the soccer champions league? Then you have to download this app: a must for a all the soccer and football fan. This app features several high quality sound effects and all of the 32 real national anthems of the teams that have taken part of the last world cup competitions, all of this together with a sharp colorful graphics. Several audio effects are included in this app: whistles, horns, goal screams, drums, reporter, cheering, booing, shouts, burp and more. Press on the anthems button, select your country, and start to sing as only true soccer fans know how to do. Your favourite soccer team marks the goal, so it is time to celebrate with all the different screams reported in this soccer soundboard. Finally the Soccer Supporter app is perfect to make joke of your friend during the football game. Press on the whistle to make your friends think that was whistled for a foul or the game is over. Do the announcer yell as if it had been scored a goal. With this app you can perform amazing prank during any championship game. - High Quality Sound Effects! - Cool Graphics! - Real National Anthems! - No Data Connection Needed To Use This App!
release_text: This is a must for supporting your favourite soccer team

description: Have you always dreamed to talk as an animal. Now with Voice Changer (Zoo) you can do it! Speak as a dog, cat, horse, pig, a chicken or other zoo and farm animals with this amazing app. This app is mainly designed for the following purposes: - Entertain baby, toddlers and preschool guys with super high quality animal sound and noise and the beautiful animal pictures. - Create amazing speech with your pet animal (drive your cat and dog crazy speaking as them). - It is also perfect to create prank call at the telephone. Three are the way of using Voice Changer Zoo 1) Parrot Mode: Create amazing speech with the selected animal. 2) Translator Mode: Your voice will be automatically translated with special morphing algorithms to the animal voice. 3) Classic Mode: Record your voice select the animal and press play. Once you're satisfied, you can save your altered voice, you can also share it with your friends using skype, whatsapp, wechat and gmail or other email. You can also create amazing ringtones with this app.

Defuse a bomb on your Android device. Memorize the colors and cut them in the correct order. Compare your scores with friends and other players online. Bomb is an intense game that requires memory and speed. Your job is to defuse the bomb by cutting the wires in the correct order. Memorize the colors and wipe the sweat from your hands as you defuse a bomb on your Android device. Compare your performance with other players online.

Falldown only has one rule: Keep the ball in the screen. Tilt your phone to control the ball. Gain more points by passing several floors without touching them. Take the maximum of bonuses and try to beat the score of the best players online. There are five types of bonuses to help you through the game and get a high score : "Dollar" : Add five points to your score. "Superbonus" : Generate bonuses on the next five floors. "Multiball" : Duplicate your ball. "Pause" : Stop scrolling for five seconds. "Ghost" : Pass through the floors. Touch the screen to pause. Gain more points by passing several floors without touching them. At any time, go into preferences for change some settings. Keep the ball on the screen Gain bonuses for the high score Compare your score to the global leaderboards

Flashlight app resembling a gas lighter Selectable flashlight colors Selectable screen background colors In an Android universe crowded with flashlight apps, Gas Lighter Free provides an element of distinction. The app displays a gas lighter similar to one you might use to light a barbecue or propane lamp. When you touch the gas lighter, your phone's screen and flash light up. A short touch produces a brief, blinking light from your flash. A longer touch turns the flashlight fully on. You can select background colors for the app's home screen, as well choose the color the home screen will display when being used as a flashlight. You'll never be in the dark again.

Add a fuzzy friend to your phone Make the Hairy Ball react to your touch Record your voice and replay it Add a fuzzy friend to phone with Talking Hairy Ball. This interactive app will entertain your kids by reacting as they shake or touch it. The Hairy Ball's eyes follow your finger across the screen, and its eyelids open and close when poked. Best of all, you can record sounds or words and the Hairy Ball will speak them back to you. You can customize the look of your Hairy Ball to your heart's content by setting different colors for eyes, lips, teeth, and more.

The best application for all sporting events. Shake your phone, make the most noise and bright flashes. Support your favorite team by pressing Hand Clapper for each goal. Illuminate the stadium with a thousand lights with your LED flash. Customize the colors of the hand and the background, set the camera view in the background for a transparent effect, finally set your preferred orientation. The Best World Cup app for Brazil 2014.
Trap your friends by simulating a speed radar. Sets the different parameters of the offense (speed, limitation, etc..) And share the radar photo with a personalized message.

Realistic shot sound Engaging graphics Intuitive interface With Shotgun Free you'll turn your Android smartphone into a pump action shotgun. To work it, simply "pump" your phone back and forth to load the virtual gun, and then simply swing your phone upward to fire.

Adjust volume with slider control Pick your background color Wake up! Sometimes somebody (or maybe you) needs a good siren blast to get going. This fun Android app is also good for parties, sporting events, silencing those who talk too much… the possibilities are endless. Whip out this handy Siren app and you'll definitely attract attention!

Use a spray paint can on your Android device Adjust the spray volume, length, and color Choose a background color Spray Free brings a can of spray paint to your Android device. Shake your device and touch the screen to spray. Adjust the angle, the color of the spray, the cap color, and the number of particles. You can also customize the length and volume of the spray as well as the background color.

This app is a one-trick pony, but the trick is fun if you can pull it off. Electric Stun Gun displays a picture of a Stungun-like device on your screen with an on/off switch. When you tap the switch, your Android device flashes and vibrates briefly, simulating an electric shock. Have fun making someone think they are about to get zapped. This may work better with younger, more impressionable people. - Fool your friends into thinking you have a real electroshock weapon - Press the on/off button to simulate an electric shock - Make your device vibrate and flash simultaneously Several sounds & skins from the menu.

If you lose constantly your phone, this app is for you. whistle continuously and strong to trigger the detection. You can adjust the precision level, ringer, etc. Detection begins when the phone screen is off.
Create your own Las Vegas sign! You can change the adjective, city and state before saving or sharing with friends.

Placing law enforcement and public safety services at your fingertips! The MyPD app is built to connect the public to their local police and allow the community to become more involved right from your smartphone. (Please note, This app is used by agencies that opt in to use it. If your community has not opted to use MyPD than you should not expect to find them on the app) Local, State, and College Police Departments as well as other law enforcement agencies are using this app to provide you with better service and improve communication. The MyPD app is free to download and does not require you to sign in or sign up to use the app. Law Enforcement agencies using this app are offering citizens the following options: • Multiple information resources and RSS feeds • 2 types of push notifications • Report anonymous crime tips • Commend a Police Officer • Submit Feedback to your Police • Ask Questions • Community Surveys • Directions to the Police Department • Police Department Contacts • Social Media • Most Wanted • Blog • Jail Info • Weather Service • National Terrorism Advisory System • FEMA • New & Alerts page • Crime Map • Website • Online Reporting • Encrypted transfer of messages • Many more additional features These are just some of the many options that your Police Department is making available to you here. A growing number of Police Departments are utilising this app for the citizens they serve. If you don't see your Department here, let them know they should join! Some of the Police Departments using or signed up for the MyPD app (in no particular order) are the Green Bay Police, Beverly Police, Cambridge Police, Rochester Police, Waco Police, Dunwoody Police, Maine DEA, Chesapeake Police, Peabody Police, Watertown Police, North Andover Police, Ipswich Police, Alhambra Police, Norton Police, Wellesley Police, Yarmouth Police, Bedford Police, New Bedford Police, York Police, Auburn Police, El Dorado Police, Los Altos Police, Palo Alto Police, Mountain View Police, Fremont Police, West Sacramento Police, Woods Cross Police, West Jordan Police, West Haven Police, Grrenwich Police, Westport Police, Warner Robins Police, Pooler Police, Peoria Police, Arcadiaolice, Hanover Park Police, Wichita Police, Bethlehem Police, Brimfield Police, Cibolo Police, Hobbs Police, Kingston Police, Chelsea Police, North Andover Police, South Portland Police, Haverford College Public Safety, Bryn Mawr College Public Safety, Rockwall Police, Warner Robins Police, Roanoke Police, Boston University Police, Rocky Mount Police, Boynton Beach Police, Amesbury Police, Swampscott Police, Bensalem Police, Corvallis Police, Plymouth Police, DeWitt Police, Columbia Police, Norfolk Police, Chesapeake Police, Rochester Police, Sturgeon Bay Police, Barre Police, Attleboro Police, Yarmouth Police, Waltham Police, Norwood Police, Ipswich Police, Glendale Police, and many more in Massachusetts, Maine, New York, California, Texas, Virginia, Ontario, Wisconsin, New Jersey, Utah, Georgia, Alabama, and New Mexico. Please do not expect your police or other local law enforcement agency here if they have not opted to use the app. Please do not give the app a bad rating because your agency is not here. Send us an email and we will encourage them to join. Please report any bugs to info@wiredblue.co This app is not for emergency use or communication with law enforcement or for immediate response situations. Always dial 9-1-1 in the United States or Canada for an emergency situation. "My Police Department" “MyPD” “WiredBlue” are Federally registered trademark of Wired Blue LLC. "Smartphones, Smart Citizens, Smart Policing" is also a WiredBlue trademark.
release_text: MyPD has been updated in version 3.0 with numerous new options, features, and bug fixes. App users from older versions will appreciate the new details and design. Your law enforcement agency is proud to offer this new and updated app to the community. Fix bugs in V3.2

description: Por favor, no realices sugerencias o preguntas de soporte en los comentarios, no puedo responder a ellos y además puede ocurrir que se me pasen por alto. Utiliza el correo electrónico disponible en el market o en la configuración. Esta aplicación complementa a 'Tiempo METEO' proporcionando widgets. No se trata de una aplicación oficial, no está patrocinada, mantenida ni apoyada por AEMET. Es necesario tener instalado 'Tiempo METEO' para que esta aplicación funcione. Las razones de separar los widgets de la aplicación son tres: - Ahora puedes tener ‘Tiempo METEO’ instalado en la tarjeta SD - Se corrige el error con algunos modelos de Samsung que movían automáticamente la aplicación a la SD, desactivando por tanto los widgets - Posibilidad de sacar más de un tipo de widget, aprovechando las características de las nuevas versiones de android y con otros temas e iconos distintos Podrás crear widgets de predicción meteorológica basada en tu ubicación o en tus localidades o playas favoritas. También pueden crearse widgets con datos de las estaciones meteorológicas de la red de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología. Si tienes alguna sugerencia o error no dudes en contactar conmigo a través del correo que aparece en el market. Configuración del Intent - Action: aemetwidgets.ACTUALIZAR - Component Package: com.projectsexception.weather.widgets - Component Class: com.projectsexception.weather.widgets.Actualizar - Broadcast: Sí Please do not do support suggestions or questions in the comments, I can not answer them and it can happen that I overlooked. Use e-mail available in the market or in the configuration. This application complements 'Time METEO' providing widgets. This is not an official app is not sponsored, maintained or supported by AEMET. You need to install 'METEO Time' for this application to work. The reasons for separating the application widgets are three:  - Now you can have 'Time METEO' installed on the SD card  - Fixed error with some Samsung models to automatically move the application to the SD, thus disabling widgets  - Ability to take more than one type of widget, using the features of the newer versions of android and various other themes and icons You can create widgets for weather forecasting based on your location or your favorite places or beaches. You can also create widgets with data from the meteorological stations of the network of the Meteorological Agency. If you have any suggestions or errors feel free to contact me via email that appears on the market. Setting Intent  - Action: aemetwidgets.ACTUALIZAR  - Component Package: com.projectsexception.weather.widgets  - Component Class: com.projectsexception.weather.widgets.Actualizar  - Broadcast: Yes
release_text: Actualización de nombre Mejoras en la detección de localización Corrección de errores

description: Protect your digital life with IDrive! IDrive for Android securely backs up your mobile data with Private Key Encryption -- the highest level of data security available -- so only you can access your files. You can backup multiple devices to one account, and sync files across your devices to access your data from anywhere. IDrive introduces Local backup using the IDrive Wi-Fi device - a complementary solution to online backup. Local backup solves the biggest problem with cloud backup – slow restores. With local backup, you can restore your data really fast! Protect some of your data for free, or choose the IDrive Unlimited Mobile plan and get unlimited backup for up to 5 mobile devices for only $4.99 per year! Features: *Backup and Restore contacts, photos, videos, calendars, texts, apps, and documents (including .doc, .pdf, .zip and more) with a single tap. *Local backup for faster restores via the IDrive Wi-Fi device *Easily sync files between all linked devices. *Link your devices to a single account and access your data from anywhere. *Instagram and Facebook Backup. *Selectively backup and restore files. *Share files and folders over a single, secure link. *Automatic upload option protects your photos and videos as soon as they are taken via wifi or cellular data. *Schedule recurring backups by day and time. *Gallery View allows you to easily slide through all your pictures and videos. Security features: *256-bit AES encryption *Private key encryption ensures only you have access to your data *Lock app with a passcode *Easily unlink devices which are lost or stolen Information on permissions: *"Read and Edit your text messages" is required to backup and restore text messages. *"Network access, network and wi-fi connections" is required to reach wi-fi and cellular network for backing up your data. *"Read, add or modify Calendar Events" is required to backup and restore calendar. *To read/write Call Logs and Contacts is required to backup, access, and restore your call history and contacts. *"Read Phone" is required to get the device ID which helps distinguish your device. *"Accounts" is required for accessing Play Store for making in-app purchases. *"Prevent device from sleeping" is required so that device doesn't go to sleep while backup/restoring is being performed. *"Run at startup" is required to run scheduled backups.

Приложение «Простой бизнес» позволяет управлять проектами и задачами в пути или на встречах. Оставаясь в курсе всех изменений рабочего процесса и оперативно реагируя, Вы сделаете работу Вашей команды более продуктивной. Вся необходимая информация по проектам, контактам и клиентской базе под рукой, где бы Вы ни находились. Основной функционал: – создание организации, приглашение в нее сотрудников и партнеров; – создание проектов и задач, назначение ответственных, прикрепление файлов к задачам; – просмотр и комментирование новостей рабочего процесса; – работа с клиентской базой; – переписка по встроенной электронной почте; – общение с сотрудниками в чате; – работа оффлайн, пока не появится Интернет-соединение. Appendix "Simple Business" allows you to manage projects and tasks on the road or in meetings. Staying up to date with all the changes in workflow and responding quickly, you make up your team more productive. All the necessary information on the projects, contacts, and customer base on hand, wherever you are.   The main features: - Creation of an organization, an invitation to her employees and partners; - The creation of projects and tasks, assigning responsibility, attach files to tasks; - Viewing and commenting on the news workflow; - Working with a client base; - Correspondence built-in e-mail; - Communication with employees in the chat; - Work offline until an Internet connection.
release_text: 1. Телефония: бесплатные внутренние звонки пользователям CRM-системы «Простой бизнес». 2. Звонки через Интернет на внешние мобильные и стационарные номера. 3. Прием входящих звонков через CRM-систему. История звонков. 4. Создание и удаление групп пользователей (сотрудников), перемещение. 5. Создание и удаление контактов и групп контактов, перемещение. 6. Редактирование своей анкеты в приложении. 7. Новый дизайн большинства разделов. 8. Восстановление пароля для входа в систему.

description: This is an app to assist with learning and memorizing the Hiragana and Katakana writing systems in Japanese. The symbols are listed with their phonetic Roman spelling, and multiple choice activities are included to help strengthen memorization. An activity that allows you to draw out the symbols is also included, as well as a listing of numbers and a map of Japan.
release_text: Removed vocabulary for now until I can go through and make it better. Fixed a couple memory leaks from stale references to context and other newbie programmer mistakes.

description: Display a new random kitty every hour with this Muzei plugin.
release_text: Bug fix: If the connection fails, the timer will wait a short time before trying again, rather than the whole hour.

description: Mit ADAC Spritpreise für Android können Sie Preise zwischen den Tankstellen in Deutschland vergleichen und gezielt die preisgünstigsten Anbieter auswählen. Die zur Verfügung gestellten Preise für die Kraftstoffsorten E5, E10 und Diesel werden "in Echtzeit" von den Tankstellen an die Markttransparenzstelle für Kraftstoffe gemeldet und an die Verbraucher weitergegeben. Außerdem können Sie sich nun auch aktuelle Erdgas/CNG-Preise anzeigen lassen. ADAC Spritpreise bietet Ihnen neben der Anzeige der Kraftstoffpreise auch die Möglichkeit an, eine Adresse in der Karte zu suchen oder eine Route zu berechnen, um gezielt günstige Tankstellen anzufahren. Bei der Adresssuche und der Stationseingabe für die Routenberechnung ist es möglich, Adressen aus den auf dem Telefon gespeicherten Kontakten auszuwählen, so dass diese nicht extra eingegeben werden müssen. Nur beim Aufruf dieser Funktion greift die Anwendung auf Ihre Kontakte zu, um Ihnen diese für die Auswahl anzuzeigen. Dazu benötigt die Anwendung die Berechtigung "Kontakte lesen", die seit Android 4.0 fest mit der von der App nicht verwendeten Berechtigung "Anrufprotokolle lesen" verbunden ist. Es werden keine personengebundenen Informationen gespeichert oder an den ADAC übermittelt. With ADAC fuel prices for Android allows you to compare prices between petrol stations in Germany and specifically for the cheapest provider. The provided prices for the fuel types E5, E10 and diesel are in "real time" reported by the stations to the transparency of the market place for fuels and passed on to consumers. You can also view current natural gas / CNG Prices Furthermore, now. ADAC fuel prices, offers in addition to the display of fuel prices and the possibility to search for an address in the map or to calculate a route to drive targeted cheap gas stations. The address search and entering the station for the route calculation it is possible to select addresses from the contacts stored on the phone so that it does not have to be entered separately. Only when you call this function, the application accesses your contacts to show them to you for selection. Is this, the application needs the permission "Read contacts" that read "Call Logs" since Android 4.0 fixed to the not used by the app permission connected. It does not store personal identifiable information, or submitted to the ADAC.
release_text: - Fixes für Abstürze - Workaround für Probleme mit Menüleiste - Unterstützung Auf- und Zuklappen des Menüs

description: BAYERNINFO MAPS bietet „Routenplanung für PKW“ und „Reiseauskunft für Bus & Bahn“ in einer App – und das alles kostenlos! Überraschungen unterwegs werden seltener. Baustellen, Sperrungen und Verspätungen vorher kennen bedeutet weniger Stress und geringere Fahrtkosten. Und wenn unterwegs doch einmal etwas Unvorhergesehenes passiert, haben Sie alternative Routenempfehlungen stets griffbereit. BAYERNINFO MAPS hat die wichtigsten Informationen für Ihre Reiseplanung: - Routenübersicht für PKW sowie Bus & Bahn, auf Wunsch auch für Park & Ride, Fahrrad und Fußweg - Verkehrslagekarte mit allen bekannten Baustellen und Sperrungen für ganz Bayern - Rastanlagensuche mit Detailinformationen zur Stellplatzzahl und Ausstattung - aktuelle Parkplatzbelegungszahlen für PKW und LKW (wird weiter ausgebaut) - ca. 100 Live-Verkehrskameras entlang der Autobahnen - Staubarometer auf wichtigen Autobahnstrecken in Bayern - Gefahrenmeldungen, Staus & Behinderungen sowie Baustellen als strukturierte Listenansicht - Haltestellen und POIs in Ihrer Umgebung nach Kategorien finden - aktuelle Abfahrtszeiten und Verspätungen zum öffentlichen Verkehr - POI Suche Zum Schluss noch eine kurze Erläuterung, für welche Zwecke die App bestimmte Berechtigungen benötigt: - Genauer Standort (GPS): Nötig zur Anzeige der eigenen Position und für das Routing von / zum eigenen Standort - Kontaktdaten lesen: Ermöglicht die Ortspunktsuche bzw. ein Routing von / zu Adressen in den Kontakten - Vollständiger Internetzugriff: Nötig für den Zugriff auf die serverseitigen Dienste (Karte, Ortspunkt- und Routensuche) - Inhalte des USB-Speichers ändern / löschen: Nötig für das Caching (Zwischenspeichern) von Kartendaten - Zugriff auf geschützten Speicher testen: Nötig für das Caching (Zwischenspeichern) von Kartendaten Leistungen aus dem Projekt BayernInfo wurden von der Europäischen Union kofinanziert. BAYERNINFO MAPS - mobil informiert - gelassen unterwegs - sicher ankommen BAYERNINFO MAPS provides "route planning for cars" and "travel information for bus and train" in one app - all for free!   Surprises on the way are rare. Know construction, closures and delays before means less stress and lower travel costs. And if the road but once something unexpected happens, you have an alternative route recommendations at your fingertips.   BAYERNINFO MAPS has the most important information for your travel:   - Route overview for cars and bus and train service, on request for Park & ​​Ride, Bike and Pedestrian - Traffic map with all known roadworks and closures for Bavaria - Rest Area Search with detailed information on the number of parking spaces and facilities - Current parking occupancy rates for cars and trucks (to be expanded) - About 100 live traffic cameras along highways - Storage Barometer major motorway routes in Bavaria - Danger messages, jams & disabilities and construction sites as a structured list view Find stops and POIs in your area by category - - Current departure times and delays to public transport - POI search   Finally, a brief explanation of the purposes for which the app needs certain permissions:   - Precise location (GPS): Necessary for displaying one's position and for routing to / from your own site - Read contact data Allows the locus point search or routing to / from addresses in the contacts - Full Internet Access: Required for access to the server-side services (map, Ortspunkt- and route search) - Modify / delete USB storage contents: Necessary for caching (caching) of map data - Access to protected memory test: Required for caching (caching) of map data   Benefits from the BayernInfo project co-financed by the European Union.   BAYERNINFO MAPS - mobile informed - let go - to arrive safely
release_text: Neu in Version 2.0.2: - Kleinere Fehlerbehebungen Neu in Version 2.0.1: - Neue Menüführung der Dienste - Neues Design - Aktuelle Parkplatzbelegungszahlen für LKW und PKW - Ortsabhängige Haltestellen- und POI-Suche über Standort, Kartenmittelpunkt oder Adresse

description: Descended from the white stallion of Mars and the rogue black filly Ahaha, herds of wild quantum horses roam the solar wind, living many histories simultaneously. Humans cannot touch them--that would either reduce the horse to a single time-line or split the human among many--but the horses respond to signals flashed at them. They can be trained, and they love to race. No horse has yet beaten the white stallion of Mars in a race across the eight planets of the Solar System. Can you find such a champion? There are countless horses to choose from, and you can create still more with a careful breeding program. Training is the key to making your chosen horse a winner. Many horses show blazing speed on some planets, but you may have to explore many strategies before you get your horse to reveal its top speed on all of the planets. If your horse can win races on all eight planets without suffering a defeat, it will be ready for the grueling match race with the white stallion of Mars. You will need to master additional strategies, including optimal use of the entangling effect, in order to win this final race. If you should ever sell one of your old champions to make room for a new one, you will face your former horse in the match race as well.
Tap screen just before the wall to hit & smash walls with bare hand screaming YEET in this endless cool new arcade game!

Note: Animals Jigsaw Puzzles is designed for tablets and may not be as nice on small phones. This jigsaw puzzle pack contains 40 jigsaws. PuzzleBoss Animals Jigsaw Puzzles provide a real jigsaw experience unlike any other. When you are tired of the mess and space real jigsaw puzzles need, check out our beautiful tablet jigsaw puzzles and you won't be disappointed! Our jigsaws are optimized for adults, use your tablet in landscape mode with lots of space for sorting pieces and finishing sections, and come with a range of puzzle settings to help you have the most authentic, pleasant experience. We've carefully crafted our jigsaw puzzle apps to give you, an adult and person worthy of respect, the best experience possible. All jigsaw puzzles are unlocked from the start along with all sizes and settings, we never interrupt your puzzle with advertising, we run offline, we don't track anything you do, and our jigsaw app permissions only enable us to download a catalog of our titles, sales and new releases. Available in English, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, French and German. Support available in English at support@puzzleboss.com !
